Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Class SwitchDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.SwitchDepot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SwitchDepot
extends Action
SwitchDepot Class defines data and methods to complete a Client's request when wanting to switch two depots during an Add interaction.

Attributes:

  • int "firstDepot": indicates the first Depot the player wants to switch
  • int "secondDepot": indicates the second Depot the player wants to switch
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • isCorrect

      public boolean isCorrect() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the input sent to the server is correct by assuring that the depot index isn't out of bounds.
      Overrides:
      isCorrect in class Action
      Returns:
      true if both firstDepot and secondDepot indexes are between 0 and 4.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the row or column index is out of bounds.
